
The vault uses RSA, but its keys were made from two secret Blum integers. Retrieve the flag from this ciphertext: 2128635850345954522257311207830704541757116748373018515475947221083900861013370268591258168997426330137667999881538037299710275644478178103497315282756946

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{h4ekq77q}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 2128635850345954522257311207830704541757116748373018515475947221083900861013370268591258168997426330137667999881538037299710275644478178103497315282756946
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=7056092167926502098373431090863941474285538053221456989354277651787261121335009975003155094316733669013060101186102534096774699527012704830241686451569637, e=4670193326307791230798694033126750791250232881142213397615521209218812094070847707558149602080391461225175671517894109700469765629033125888386219583652771
The lower 104 bits of p are: 68306159136225862810735750938556348279

extra_info: p=64481403203697792522254339669102066208047275983457111145472992414740979890039, q=109428328438141973370580710273912521463529540589309757320746863522383947607683, Ï†(n)=7056092167926502098373431090863941474285538053221456989354277651787261121334836065271513254550840833963117086598430957280201932658546484974304561524071916
